entry.title: Copy control Custom field
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

We have created Custom field in all Sales documents, For Example, If we enter any values in the Sales inquiry Custom field, the value in that field should be carried over to Sales quotation Custom field when creating Sales quotation with reference to Sales inquiry, to achieve this what are the Configuration steps should be done from Functional side ?

entry.title: Make PPR0 Mandatory (SO cannot be saved if PPR0 is missing)
entry.content:
Hi all, i want to ask about PPR0 item price...

when we create Sales Order, if there is item with no PPR0, system will  give us warning (Condition pricing is missing or error) but we can still save it and we can delivered it with 0 price...

i want to make it cannot be saved if there is item with no PPR0.

any way to solve that?

entry.title: Auto Post Goods Issue
entry.content:
I would like to auto post GI after creating OBD in s4hana cloud public.

Is that possible to do via custom logic? 

Best Regards,

Khaing Zin

entry.title: Unable to Post Direct Activity Allocation to Event-Based Investment Project WBS Element
entry.content:
HI,

I am working in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud and encountering an issue when trying to post costs to an investment project using the app Manage Direct Activity Allocation (F3697A). The receiver is a WBS element that belongs to an event-based investment project (Event-Based Settlement of Investment Projects and Assets Under Construction).

Despite using the same cost center, activity type, and account as in other successful postings (including Overhead Projects, Projects with Revenue, and non-event-based Investment Projects), the system throws the following errors:

  1. KI153 - Account assignment to activity types not active in CO area A000 in 2025
    Diagnosis:
    Assignment to activity types is not active in fiscal year 2025 in controlling area A000.
    Procedure:
    The system suggests activating account assignment to activity types in the fiscal-year-dependent settings for CO area A000.

  2. Account 55110000 0030 is blocked for posting

However, I believe the issue is not related to the activity type or the account itself, since the same configuration works correctly in other projects. The only difference is the receiver WBS element, which in this case belongs to an event-based investment project.

Could you please advise if there are any restrictions or additional configurations required for direct activity allocation in event-based investment projects in SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud?

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards

Vero

entry.title: I am not able to Assign a Single Material to Multiple Fixed Bins in the Same Storage Type
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support Team,

I was not able to assign a single material to multiple fixed bins within the same storage type in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition.

For example:
Material A000006447 is assigned to storage type VK01.
We would like to assign it to the following fixed bins simultaneously:

  • VK01_StackModul

  • VK02_VentilModul

  • VK03_VEModul

When using the Assign Fixed Bin app, I added multiple fixed bin entries maintained for the same material within a single storage type,But stock was not moving to other different fixed bin.

entry.title: Assign Accounting Principles to Ledgers 4G
entry.content:
Hi,
I’m configuring an Italian company, but when I try to post a document, the system displays the following error message:

"Please enter an accounting principle for ledger 4G and CoCode 2310

"Only one ledger can have local acctg principles on CoCode level assigned"

 

I’m trying to assign the accounting principle ITAP to ledger 4G and to each company code, but the system doesn’t allow me to save the changes. The accounting principle ITAP is already assigned to all company codes for ledger 0L.

Can someone help me correctly configure the customizing step “Assign Accounting Principles to Ledgers and Company Codes”?

Thanks

entry.title: Cross-Plant Transfer Error: “No accounts maintained for company code clearing” in Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hey experts, I’m getting this error in Public Cloud while doing a cross-plant transfer (1030 → 1040, different company codes):
“No accounts maintained for company code clearing between company codes 1030 and 1040”
STO is created and Automatic Account Determination in FI is set up for both directions.
Same inputs work fine in the test system. Can anyone identify this error?

entry.title: Where-used Table / CDS
entry.content:
Problem: Where-used for tables doesn't work properly in S/4 Public Cloud.

Example: Table SKB1 amd T004F has a interface that you can use - but in eclipse when asking for Where-Used they do not appear at all. SAP Business Accelerator Hub also do not show them ( unless I'm not using it correctly ).

For example, SKB1 can be found in I_GLAccountInCompanyCode. Is this a known limitation or what I'm doing wrong while trying to find them? I've found them by navigation / search for plausible names but where-used would really help speeding up the process.

entry.title: Warehouse management storage bin (Cloud Public Edition)
entry.content:

I have a warehouse management related question (Public Cloud):

If yes, what is the scope item that you will need for this process? 

 

Thank you for helping and have a great day!

entry.title: Updating custom field extended for OPD view C_BILLINGDOCUMENTOMPARAMDET
entry.content:
Hi,

We have create a custom field to determine when to trigger EDI channel for different billing documents. The custom field is extended to CDS view C_BILLINGDOCUMENTOMPARAMDET for OPD. However, how do we populate this custom field with data? The only BAdi that works is SD_BIL_DATA_TRANSFER but we have no custom routine for data transfer so it doesn't feel right to use this field. 

Any suggestion on another BAdi that could be used in S4HANA Public cloud for populating custom field in billing OPD data source. 

Thanks!

/Jyoti

entry.title: Clarification on Recommended Approach to Remove Inventory Before Activating Split Valuation
entry.content:
Hi,

This is for the production system. The client wants to make one product split valuated, which is currently not set up as split.

We can see there is inventory uploaded from go-live and also some open OBDs for movement type 201 (for the WM-managed storage location). I understand that the open OBDs need to be closed — by adjusting the quantity to 0 (which marks picking progress as 100%) and then performing Goods Issue for ‘0’ quantity to close the OBD.

After that, we’ll need to remove the existing inventory. I would like to confirm SAP’s recommended approach for doing this. Should we:

  1. Consume the stock to another G/L or cost center and bring it back once the product is made split-valuated,
    or
  2. Reverse the 561 material document that was used during the initial upload to avoid inconsistencies and ensure proper tracking in the future?

Please advise on the best practice for this scenario.

Kind regards,
Neha Agarwal

entry.title: In SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, We can't use the cumulative allocation by profit center
entry.content:
Hi Specialist.
We used the cumulative allocation by profit center in ECC.
But, we can't use the cumulative allocation by profit center in S/4 public cloud. Only by cost center...
The BS accounts must allocate cumulative by profit center.

How resolve this change?

entry.title: Trigger Equipment Replication (Event Mesh) from S/4HANA Public Cloud to Service Cloud V2
entry.content:
Dear Experts,

I set up the integration of Equipments based on the SAP Standard guide to replicate Equipments from S/4HANA Public Cloud to Service Cloud V2. The integration is done via SAP Event Mesh, configured on BTP.

The replication works fine when equipments are created or changed in S4, but I would need to trigger an initial load of all (incl. old) equipments. The guide does not provide any information how this can be done, and since there is no replication model for this event based integration, I cannot trigger it like the other master data interfaces.

Does anyone have a hint on how this can be achieved without having to change every single equipment in S4?

Thanks in advance!
BR,
Richard

entry.title: SAP minor update
entry.content: When receiving a notification about a minor upgrade in SAP S/4 HANA Public Cloud (e.g., https://me.sap.com/notes/3374323/E), is it correct to understand that in S/4 HANA Public Cloud the upgrade is performed automatically, and there is no need to carry out any additional maintenance work?

entry.title: Change Acct Assmt Grp Mat. field in Manage Credit Memo Request
entry.content:
I would like to change Acct Assmt Grp Mat. field value in Credit Memo Request Item.

Is it possible to change that value via custom logic?

Best Regards,

Khaing Zin

entry.title: Fixed Asset Migration with Asset Sub number errors
entry.content:
Hi you guys,

When performing the master fixed asset migration, I encountered an error for assets with sub-numbers other than 0 (such as 1, 2, 3 — internally numbered). The error message says:

“Main asset xxxxxx does not exist in company code xxxx” (Error code: FAA_MD 35).

I have already included the main asset (with subnumber = 0) together with the sub-assets (1, 2, 3) in the same migration file, and also tried migrating the main asset (subnumber = 0) first and then the sub-assets separately. However, the error still persists.

If anyone knows how to resolve this issue, could you please guide me?

Thank you so much.

entry.title: Mass PO Print
entry.content:
Dear SAP Support,

 

We are currently using SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition, and we would like to implement mass printing of Purchase Orders (POs). Our requirement is to trigger the print output for multiple POs at once, ideally in a scheduled or background process, and send them to a defined print queue or generate PDF output.
We are looking for a step-by-step procedure that covers:
Setup and configuration of print queues
Output parameter determination for Purchase Orders
Usage of the Print Scheduled Purchase Orders (App ID F3461)
Integration with SAP Cloud Print Manager (CPM)
Monitoring and handling of print queue items
(If possible) Options for downloading PO outputs in bulk as PDF
We would also like to understand the standard limitations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud Public Edition regarding bulk printing or mass PDF download, and whether any SAP-provided extensibility options or APIs exist for this scenario.
Please provide detailed guidance, relevant documentation, or best practices that would help us enable this functionality in our tenant.

 

Thank you in advance for your support.

 

Best regards,




------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.
